title: Cant Login to New Account???
body: I just made a new account and I can't login. It keeps telling me that my password or user is incorrect, but I checked it and all the info was fine. Nothing was happening so I made another one and same thing happened. Is it just me? Or is there and actual problem with the system??

replies.body: You might be connecting to the wrong region through your patcher.  If you made an NA account, make sure it's set to North America on the top right.  Hope that helps!
